name: SandFlower
description:
SandFlower is a french game that i made for school (with 5 others peoples)

We made it with only 3 weeks as project

For the english synopsis, you are an explorer in desert and you found a mysterious temple. When you get  on it, a landside just block the enter and you beging to be lack of oxygene. So you need to run and try to escape for your life !

It's a very short game with some bugs but it could be fun to speedrun. If you play it, don't forget to leave a comment !

See you for some next project here !

FlooAs
